meanings.definition: A light two-wheeled passenger vehicle drawn by one or more people.
meanings.sent1: Tourists in the city enjoyed riding rikshaws to explore the streets.
meanings.sent2: The rikshaws lined up outside the train station, ready to take passengers.
meanings.sent3: The rikshaws in the race were so fast, they almost flew past the finish line!
meanings.sent4: In the busy market, the rikshaws weaved through the crowd like nimble dancers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rikshaws painted a vibrant picture against the grey cityscape.

meanings.definition: To transport or be transported by a rickshaw.
meanings.sent1: She decided to rikshaws to the market instead of walking.
meanings.sent2: They rikshaws through the bustling streets, enjoying the cool breeze.
meanings.sent3: The friends rikshaws to the park, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent4: His dreams rikshaws him to far-off lands filled with adventure.
meanings.sent5: The music in the rikshaws made the journey feel like a joyful dance.
